channel.title: .bat to .sh
channel.description:
can anyone tell me how to convert this to .sh for running on linux (centos)
[code]@echo off title Rune Legacy
set lib=%lib%bin: set lib=%lib%deps/castlewars.jar: set lib=%lib%deps/collisionmap.jar: set lib=%lib%deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar: set lib=%lib%deps/jython.jar: set lib=%lib%deps/mysql-connector-java-5.1.6-bin.jar: set lib=%lib%deps/xstream.jar: set lib=%lib%deps/mina.jar: set lib=%lib%deps/mysql.jar:deps/RuneTopListV2.1.jar: set lib=%lib%deps/poi.jar: set lib=%lib%deps/slf4j.jar: set lib=%lib%deps/slf4j-nop.jar: set lib=%lib%deps/netty.jar:
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -classpath %lib% server.Server exit[/code]
i already converted -cp to classpath and ; to : but, my rune is weird with the c:/ in it

item.title: .bat to .sh
item.dc:creator: @larry125069 larry125069
item.description:
@larry125069 wrote:

can anyone tell me how to convert this to .sh for running on linux (centos)

[code]@echo off
title Rune Legacy

set lib=%lib%bin:
set lib=%lib%deps/castlewars.jar:
set lib=%lib%deps/collisionmap.jar:
set lib=%lib%deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar:
set lib=%lib%deps/jython.jar:
set lib=%lib%deps/mysql-connector-java-5.1.6-bin.jar:
set lib=%lib%deps/xstream.jar:
set lib=%lib%deps/mina.jar:
set lib=%lib%deps/mysql.jar:deps/RuneTopListV2.1.jar:
set lib=%lib%deps/poi.jar:
set lib=%lib%deps/slf4j.jar:
set lib=%lib%deps/slf4j-nop.jar:
set lib=%lib%deps/netty.jar:

“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -classpath %lib% server.Server
exit[/code]

i already converted -cp to classpath and ; to : but, my rune is weird with the c:/ in it
